items.description: Use this email template for inviting customers as staff in your application.
items.name: Admin Invite Email

html.template:
Hi,

{{ message }}

Use the button below to accept invite. This Invite is only valid for the next 24 hours.

Accept Invite

If you’re having trouble with the button above, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser.

{{ inviteLink }}

items.description: Use this email template for verifying email ID of customers, via a One-Time-Password.
items.name: Verify Otp

html.template:
Hi {{ userName }},

Enter the below OTP to verify your email. This OTP is only valid for the next 10 minutes.

{{ otp }}

text.template:
Verify Email

Hi {{ userName }},
Enter the below OTP to verify your email. This
OTP is only valid for the next 10 minutes.
{{ otp }}

html.template: Sample email body
Sample email body Test

items.description: Use this email template for verifying email ID of customers, via a One-Time-Password.
items.name: Verify Otp

html.template:
Hi {{ userName }},

Enter the below OTP to verify your email. This OTP is only valid for the next 10 minutes.

{{ otp }}
Sample email body

items.description: Use this SMS template for inviting customers as staff in your application.
items.name: Admin Invite SMS

message.template: {{ message }}. You have been invited to join us. Click {{ inviteUrl }} to accept the invite - Team Fynd

items.description: Use this SMS template for verifying mobile number of customers, via a One-Time-Password.
items.name: Send Otp

message.template: Please verify your phone with OTP Code - {{otp}} in the box given.

items.description: Use this SMS template for verifying mobile number of customers, via a One-Time-Password.
items.name: Verify Otp

message.template: {{ otp }} is your OTP code for verifying your phone number on your account - Team Fynd {{ androidHash }}
